channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Sperm Donor With a Cancer-Causing Gene Fathered at Least 197 Kids
item.description: Because only part of the man's sperm carried the mutation, only the second round of genetic testing revealed the problem. By then, it was already too late.

item.title: Test du Mova E40 Ultra : un aspirateur robot ultra complet à un prix tout petit
item.description: Les robots aspirateurs laveurs ont atteint un niveau d'efficacité impressionnant, tandis que leur tarif a eu tendance à s'envoler, franchissant allègrement la barre symbolique des 1 000 euros pour les modèles les plus aboutis. C’est là qu’intervient le Mova E40 Ultra, qui reprend les bases du nettoyage autonome en y ajoutant des fonctionnalités avancées, tout en affichant un positionnement tarifaire ultra-agressif pour se faire une place sur le podium. ...

item.title: Many States Say They’ll Defy RFK Jr.’s Changes to Hepatitis B Vaccination
item.description: Most Democratic-led states will continue to recommend the hepatitis B vaccine at birth, despite a CDC advisory panel’s vote against it.

item.title: Microsoft issues patches for 56 security flaws - all 'important' severity or above
item.description: Most are privilege escalation flaws, and one was exploited in the wild as a zero-day.

item.title: 12 steps you can take right now to be safer online
item.description: There's a fundamental question you can ask of both the internet and real life: "How do I enjoy my time here without taking unnecessary risks?" In grass-touching meatspace, you can cut out processed foods, carry pepper spray and avoid skydiving without a partner. But the best methods for staying safe online aren't as intuitive. The internet is a massive town square where people are constantly bellowing deeply personal facts about themselves. It's no surprise that it's become a breeding ground for scams, theft and other criminal activity. Given the breadth of dangers, it may feel easier to throw...

item.title: OSHA investigating new crane accident at SpaceX’s Starbase facility
item.description: A subcontractor says he was crushed by a metal support, breaking his hip, knee, and tibia. He's suing SpaceX and the construction company who employed him.

item.title: Here Are All the Awesome-Sounding Genre Films Coming to Sundance 2026
item.description: New films by Kogonada, Cathy Yan, Andrew Stanton, and more will be playing at the legendary festival next month.

item.title: Marco Rubio bans Calibri font at State Department for being too DEI
item.description: Calibri, which could make documents easier to read for the vision impaired, was apparently installed in 2023 by the department’s then-DEI office.

item.title: State Department: Calibri font was a DEI hire
item.description: The US Department of State is unwinding a 2023 decision to use san-serif Calibri font on all official communications and switching to Times New Roman instead, The New York Times reports. In a memo obtained by NYT titled "Return to Tradition: Times New Roman 14-Point Font Required for All Department Paper," Secretary of State Marco Rubio frames the change as a way to return professionalism to the State Department."Switching to Calibri achieved nothing except the degradation of the department’s official correspondence," Rubio said in the memo. That's because the font is "informal" and clashes wi...

item.title: August’s founders are back with a smart front door
item.description: It looks like someone may have finally done the smart door right. Doma Home, a new company from the creators of the August smart lock, has announced its first product: the Doma Intelligent Door. A motorized smart door that automatically opens as you approach and closes after you enter, the Doma door also features built-in […]

item.title: Apple’s 5K Studio Display is down to its lowest price in months
item.description: Apple’s Studio Display is an investment even while Amazon has the tilt-adjustable model marked down to $1,368 ($231 off) — its lowest price in several months. The 27-inch 5K monitor looks incredible, and has a built-in six-speaker audio system that impressed us in our tests. Its three microphone array and Apple’s optional voice isolation mode made […]...

item.title: Not ready to say goodbye to Taylor Swift's The Eras Tour? You can live it one last time on Disney+ very soon
item.description: Disney+ is coming in hot with two new Taylor Swift projects for diehards to stream this weekend.

item.title: L’éditeur vidéo de Google Photos était basique, il devient enfin utilisable
item.description: C'est la fin du montage vidéo basique chez Google. L'application Google Photos déploie une refonte massive de ses outils d'édition. Google a déployé une interface pensée pour le tactile, des modèles intelligents et une gestion du son digne de ce nom.

item.title: Hackers tricked ChatGPT, Grok and Google into helping them install malware
item.description: Ever since reporting earlier this year on how easy it is to trick an agentic browser, I've been following the intersections between modern AI and old-school scams. Now, there's a new convergence on the horizon: hackers are apparently using AI prompts to seed Google search results with dangerous commands. When executed by unknowing users, these commands prompt computers to give the hackers the access they need to install malware. The warning comes by way of a recent report from detection-and-response firm Huntress. Here's how it works. First, the threat actor has a conversation with an AI assis...

item.title: YouTube TV to launch genre-based subscription plans in 2026
item.description: The new packages will give consumers more flexibility over the content that they want to pay for.

item.title: 5 essential stretches you should be doing every day, according to an expert
item.description: Tight hips, sore shoulders or a stiff back don't have to be a daily reality. These expert-approved, no-fuss moves will help you boost mobility, reduce pain and smooth out any sign of ‘tech neck’

item.title: #FrandroidOffreMoi des lunettes AR ultra pratiques de Xreal
item.description: Jour 10 du calendrier de l'Avent de Frandroid et il est temps de vous présenter les lunettes Xreal One Pro (et un module Xreal Eye) qui sont à gagner via notre concours.

item.title: Meta might charge for a future AI model
item.description: Meta's next AI model could mark a change in its "open source" AI strategy that Mark Zuckerberg had called "the path forward." Currently, the company is working on a new AI model, code-named Avocado, that it might charge for access to, Bloomberg reports. Last year, Meta launched its open source (depending on who you ask, […]

item.title: A Vital NASA Mars Orbiter Has Gone Dark
item.description: MAVEN has circled Mars for more than a decade, exploring the planet and relaying data from robots on the surface.

item.title: Measles Outbreak Nears Grim Milestone as Hundreds Quarantine in South Carolina
item.description: What happens when your country's public health system is run by anti-vaccine activists?

item.title: 5 rumored Samsung Galaxy S26 upgrades – from chipset surprises to magnetic charging
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy S26 line is expected to debut in early 2026 – here are the biggest rumored upgrades we've heard so far.

item.title: Cette batterie Anker (20 000 mAh et 87 W) à -30% est la solution ultime pour ne jamais tomber en panne
item.description: Les batteries externes sont réputées pour être des accessoires pratiques et salvateurs pour celles et ceux à court de batterie sur leur smartphone. En ce moment, celle d'Anker avec une capacité de 20 000 mAh et une puissance de 87 W est proposée avec 30 % de réduction.

item.title: Reddit is testing verification badges
item.description: Verified users will actually be notable figures, not just people who paid for the checkmark.

item.title: YouTube TV Plans will let you choose genre-specific content packages
item.description: YouTube TV, which launched in 2017 as a $35-per-month all-in-one service, will soon introduce YouTube TV Plans. Although the announcement is light on details, we know the initiative will let you sign up for genre-specific packages, such as sports and news. In other words, it's the final step in the legacy-cable-ification of the service.YouTube hasn't said anything about pricing. But it's probably safe to assume that narrowing your available content will reduce your bill. A year ago, the company raised its monthly cost to $83. That's 137 percent higher than the service’s launch price nearly nin...

item.title: This ROG Xbox Ally deal might be your last chance at a gift before Christmas — it's almost 20% off on Amazon
item.description: Black Friday and Cyber Monday are long gone, but that doesn't mean winter sales are, and the Asus ROG Xbox Ally is fortunately on sale on Amazon.

item.title: Prise en main du TV géant de 116 pouces Hisense 116UX : le téléviseur LCD de tous les records
item.description: D’une diagonale de 116 pouces, le téléviseur LCD Hisense 116UX est le plus grand modèle actuellement commercialisé. Mais outre sa très grande taille, ce qui est intéressant, c'est la nouvelle technologie de rétroéclairage utilisée : un panneau de Mini LED RGB. Prometteur d’une très forte luminosité, mais aussi et surtout d’une couverture des espaces colorimétriques jamais atteinte sur un modèle LCD, nous avons voulu vérifier cela au cours d’une prise en main. ...

item.title: 20 Sci-Fi, Fantasy, and Horror Authors Pick Their Favorite Sci-Fi, Fantasy, and Horror Books of 2025
item.description: io9 reached out to genre writers and asked them to share the titles they couldn't put down this year.

item.title: Amazon brings same-day deliveries of perishable food items to 1,300 new areas
item.description: Amazon is introducing same-day delivery of perishable food items to 1,300 new cities and towns throughout the country, upping the total service area to more than 2,300 locations. This expansion covers cities like Boise, Salt Lake City, Fort Collins, Omaha, Des Moines and many more. Check the link to see if it has expanded to where you live. The commerce giant says it will be bringing the service to even more cities in 2026, making the platform a real rival to stuff like Instacart and Walmart+. Amazon introduced this feature earlier this year and it has proven to be quite the success, given tod...

item.title: This deal on the Samsung Galaxy Watch 7 makes it an unbeatable budget smartwatch
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 7 drops to a record-low price of $129.99 at Amazon

item.title: L’ère des super APU est là, l’AMD Strix Halo arrive dans une tablette gaming surpuissante
item.description: C'est officiel : l'ère des « super APU » commence aujourd'hui. OneXplayer dégaine sa Super X, une tablette propulsée par les nouveaux monstres d'AMD, les Ryzen AI MAX 300. La technologie est fascinante, les performances graphiques s'annoncent inédites pour une puce intégrée. Mais attendez de voir le prix avant de vous emballer.

item.title: Instagram is auto-generating SEO-friendly headlines when users posts appear in Google search results
item.description: Instagram is generating SEO-friendly headlines for user posts.

item.title: AMD’s New Gaming Upscaler Is Here to Knock Nvidia Off Its Throne
item.description: The new 'Redstone" AI upscaler makes PC games look better, but it would be truly spectacular on consoles or handhelds.

item.title: Un satellite franco-chinois a détecté la plus lointaine supernova jamais observée !
item.description: Les explosions de supernovae sont initialement extrêmement lumineuses et visibles à des milliards d'années-lumière, ce qui les rend détectables à de grandes distances cosmologiques et permet de sonder des strates anciennes de l'histoire du Cosmos. C'est d'autant plus vrai lorsqu'elles sont...

item.title: SpaceX Hypes 2026 IPO With Predictable Ingredient: AI in Orbit
item.description: Elon Musk is building Skynet, from the movie Don't Build Skynet.

item.title: How to know if your health savings account is subpar
item.description: It’s worthwhile to conduct due diligence on your HSA by assessing the following. Paired with high-deductible healthcare plans, health savings accounts help ease healthcare costs. HSAs are a triple tax-advantaged vehicle in the tax code, allowing for pretax contributions, tax-free compounding, and tax-free withdrawals for qualified medical expenses. However, few owners fund their HSAs to the maximum, and even fewer invest their HSA dollars outside a savings account....

item.title: Assurez vos arrières avec ce lot de quatre AirTag qui perd 40 € chez Amazon
item.description: Fini les objets perdus avec ce lot de quatre AirTag disponibles pour 89 euros au lieu de 129 euros chez Amazon. Parfait pour ne plus perdre sa voiture dans les parkings bondés des centres commerciaux en cette période de fêtes.

item.title: The UK government will 'look into' Rockstar's firing of union-organizing workers
item.description: Rockstar Games may have to answer for what appears to be union-busting behavior. UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer, under pressure from parliament, said the government will "look into" the firing of 31 employees in October.The sacked workers were all part of a private trade union chat group on Discord. The company claimed the firings were "for gross misconduct" and accused the workers of sharing confidential information outside of the company.But based on what we know, it's hard to see that characterization as anything but union-busting in search of legal cover. The Independent Workers' Union of ...

item.title: EU upholds Intel antitrust ruling but cuts fine by a third
item.description: Intel's €1.06 billion fine has been cut to 'just' €237 million, but this relates to anticompetitive behavior two decades ago.

item.title: Are smart string lights worth it? I've tested sets from Philips Hue and Nanoleaf to find out
item.description: Get that lightbulb moment with my guide on what to look out for when choosing your smart string lights.

item.title: OpenAI appoints Slack CEO Denise Dresser as first Chief Revenue Officer
item.description: Dresser helped integrate Slack into Salesforce before becoming the CEO in 2023. OpenAI said Tuesday it has picked Slack CEO Denise Dresser as its first chief of revenue, a message to wary investors that the ChatGPT maker is serious about making a profit from its artificial intelligence technology.

item.title: Currys launches a last-minute Epic Deals sale — here are the 13 best tech bargains I'd buy before Christmas
item.description: Currys has kept some of its biggest Black Friday deals live as part of its latest Epic Deals event, so I've rounded up the 13 best offers I'd recommend buying.

item.title: The best VPN deals: Up to 88 percent off ProtonVPN, Surfshark, ExpressVPN, NordVPN and more
item.description: With a good virtual private network (VPN), you can stream TV shows and events from all over the world, protect your information from hackers and thwart those online trackers that watch you sleep and show you weird personalized ads. Although we strongly recommend using a VPN, you shouldn't jump on just any deal — a bit of comparison shopping goes a long way in this market. The pricing you see on VPN websites is often not an accurate portrayal of what you'll actually pay. Even so, there are some great bargains on the table. Black Friday and Cyber Monday may be over, but lots of the best VPNs — i...

item.title: Bluesky enforces age checks to comply with Australia's under-16s social media ban – and reverses Mississippi's block
item.description: Blusky took a bold decision and decided to follow Australia's under-16s social media ban, despite not being directly required to. The company also reversed restrictions in Mississippi, but still believes that the law is flawed.

item.title: J’ai testé à Paris le Tesla FSD : pourquoi j’ai hâte que ce système encore interdit soit autorisé en Europe
item.description: Encore interdit en Europe, nous avons pu tester le système FSD (Full Self-Drive) de Tesla à Paris en avant-première. De quoi découvrir un système de conduite autonome étonnant de maturité… et faire le point sur ce qui empêche son arrivée dans nos contrées.

item.title: The Magic: The Gathering Edge of Eternities Commander Deck Bundle has hit its best-ever price — save over $40 at Amazon
item.description: The Magic: The Gathering deal: Edge of Eternities Commander Deck Bundle is on sale for $132.24 on Amazon. That's the lowest-ever price for this set.

item.title: The 27 best gifts for travelers who are always on the move
item.description: I'm convinced that whoever said it's about the journey, not the destination, has never traveled. Try sitting on a plane for 16 hours - plus delays, airport security, and a snoring seat neighbor - and then get back to me. While getting from point A to point B can feel like a test of endurance, […]
